ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject

Class Resources

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.Resources

  • public class Resources
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to define static resources in one place for easy access and to avoid cluttering the rest of the codebase. All resources can be imported at once like this:

    import static ca.mcgill.ecse211.lab3.Resources.*;

        public static final int DELTA_THRESHOLD
